Text:
This is one of the best torrent so far, quick D/L and great music videos.

However, I have a few suggestions:

Can you please make the clips longer, lets say double of what they are now?   Any chance of having song names , artist, year, not just listed here?

Also being a DVD format, can you make a few chapters, its easier to scroll through?

Thank you again for this !

Will be seeding 24/7
